text: @TMobile @Tesla #TMobileTuesdays + #contest @Tesla I would take my car to work, where I care for COVID+ patients, then after work drive along the beach to gather my thoughts while driving home after caring for my patients #Icare #COVID19  #WearAMask #SocialDistancing #staysafe #registerednurse

domain.name: Brand Vertical

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
